payable","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"sweep","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{"requestOffset(string,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of HBAR (in tinybars) to send for the offset","metadata":"JSON (or any string) with fields like:        {          \"projectId\": \"VCS-191\",          \"beneficiaryName\": \"Acme Inc.\"        }"}}},"title":"HbarOffset","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"getBalance()":{"notice":"Helper to read contract balance (HBAR)."},"requestOffset(string,uint256)":{"notice":"User sends HBAR and metadata describing their offset request."},"sweep(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Sweep HBAR from the contract to a treasury wallet.         Typically called by your backend / ops wallet."}},"notice":"Users send HBAR with metadata describing what they want to offset.         An off-chain relayer listens for the OffsetRequested event, calls         Carbonmark API to retire carbon credits, and records the result.
